        create prepositional phrase from nmod dependency. provides surface type and concept type using boolean
        Parameters:
        td - Dependency relation from the CoreNLP tool dependency parsing
        listDependencies - List of dependencies parsed by the CoreNLP tool.

        Returns:

      • emotionIndicator

        public static int emotionIndicator(java.lang.String word)
        if verb indicates emotion
        Parameters:
        word - the word to use
        Returns:
        Returns 1 if the word is found in the negatives list and 2 if the word is found in the positives list.

      • extract

        public java.util.List<StorySentence> extract(java.lang.String text,
                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> coreference)
        Extracts info from sentence to story sentences using dependency relations, based on the rules for extracting dependency relations.
        Parameters:
        text - The sentence(s) to be processed
        coreference - the coreference map of the sentence, from the preprocessing process.
        Returns:
        list of story sentence object with extracted information

      • extractDependency

        private void extractDependency(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> coreference,
                               edu.stanford.nlp.trees.TypedDependency td,
                               StorySentence storySentence,
                               java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.trees.TypedDependency> listDependencies,
                               int noOftokens)
        This processes the dependecies extracted by the CoreNLP tool.
        Parameters:
        coreference - the coreference map of the sentence, from the preprocessing process.
        td - the dependency relation from the CoreNLP tool dependency parsing
        storySentence - the story sentence object to store the extracted relations
        listDependencies - the list of dependencies parsed by the CoreNLP tool.
        noOftokens - the sentence number

      • findDependencies

        public static java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.trees.TypedDependency> findDependencies(edu.stanford.nlp.ling.IndexedWord iw,
                                                                                      java.lang.String inputType,
                                                                                      java.lang.String rel,
                                                                                      java.util.List<edu.stanford.nlp.trees.TypedDependency> list)
        Returns a list of TypeDependency where the IndexedWord matches the end of the TypeDependency (gov or dep) and have the same dependency relation based on the Rel parameter.
        Parameters:
        iw - The word being searched from the Type Dependencies.
        inputType - Determines which end of the dependency relation is being searched “dep” or “gov”(dependency or governor).
        rel - The dependency relation to be searched from the list of dependencies.
        list - List of dependencies parsed by the CoreNLP tool.
        Returns:
        a list of TypeDependency where the IndexedWord matches the end of the TypeDependency (gov or dep) and have the same dependency relation based on the Rel parameter.

      • getNER

        public static java.lang.String getNER(java.lang.String text)
        Tries to classify the NER of the input text from the NER_ENTITY_LIST using the CRFClassifier, if classification is not possible this returns “UNKNOWN”
        Parameters:
        text - Word to be classified.
        Returns:
        the NER of the input text from the NER_ENTITY_LIST, if classification is not possible this returns “UNKNOWN”

      • getSRL

        public static java.lang.String getSRL(java.lang.String text)
        Tries to identify the role of the input text from the SRL_ENTITY_LIST using the Concepts Database, if role was not identified this returns “UNKNOWN”
        Parameters:
        text - Word to be identified
        Returns:
        the role of the input text from the SRL_ENTITY_LIST, if role was not identified this returns “UNKNOWN”

        storySentence - the story sentence
